ch.leica.sdk.Utilities

Class LiveImagePixelConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.leica.sdk.Utilities.LiveImagePixelConverter

  • public class LiveImagePixelConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert 2D coordinates to polar coordinates for re-positioning the 3D-Disto camera
